response.overview: Have you ever heard of the "Domino Effect" is the question that births "Mistakes and Monsters". A police officer (Kelvin Rowe) interrogates a young female (Payton Luedeke) who has information on the murders of many mob bosses in the city. He soon questions himself on the matter of who actually has control of the situation. The truth could get him killed. (From Amazon Prime)
response.title: Mistakes and Monsters
